result.reason: VMware Horizon uses proprietary PCoIP/Blast protocols with no public CLI/API for embedding, so we need clarification on what integration the requester envisions (launch external client, partial RDP fallback, or full protocol implementation).
result.approach: Needs community input on scope: launching the Horizon Client executable (like PuTTY integration) is feasible; embedding the proprietary PCoIP/Blast stream is not, since VMware offers no embeddable SDK. If launch-based, add a new IntegratedProgram protocol entry pointing to vmware-view.exe with connection parameters.
